titleStmt.title: Eighteen sermons preached upon several texts of Scripture by William Whittaker, late minister of Magdalen Bermondsey, Southwark ; to which is added his funeral sermon preached by Sam. Annesley.
titleStmt.author: Whittaker, William, 1629-1672.
